subject: Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Dementia
Concussions
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Ray Easterling, a retired Atlanta Falcons safety who committed suicide in April, had the degenerative disease chronic traumatic encephalopathy, according to an autopsy report.
snippet: Ray Easterling, a retired Atlanta Falcons safety who committed suicide in April, had the degenerative disease chronic traumatic encephalopathy, according to an autopsy report.
